title: QnA Query-Document Vectors Distance
description: Computes and emits selected distance between Query-Document dense vectors

skip.title: Skip This Stage
skip.description: Set to true to skip this stage.

label.title: Label
label.description: A unique label for this stage.

condition.title: Condition
condition.description: Define a conditional script that must result in true or false. This can be used to determine if the stage should process or not.

queryVectorContextKey.title: Query Vector Context Key
queryVectorContextKey.description: Name of the query context key containing dense vector (as double array)

documentVectorField.title: Document Vector Field
documentVectorField.description: Name of the document field containing dense vector (as double array) or compressed vector (as string)

keepDocumentVectorField.title: Keep document vector field
keepDocumentVectorField.description: Should the document field with the dense vector kept and returned in the response

distanceType.title: Distance Type
distanceType.description: One of the following functions: cosine_similarity, cosine_distance, euclidean_distance, dot_product

documentDistanceResultField.title: Document Vectors Distance Field
documentDistanceResultField.description: Name of the result document field containing vectors distance. Might be used for further results sorting.

failOnError.title: Fail on Error
failOnError.description: Flag to indicate if this stage should throw an exception if an error occurs.
